publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3611# Helen Eadie: General Agreement on Trade in Services—That the Parliament welcomes the Department of Trade and Industry (DTI) consultation on the General Agreement on Trade in Services (GATS); notes that GATS covers many areas that are within the Parliament’s legislative competence, and believes that all interested parties across Scotland should submit their views to the DTI before the final date for submissions on 3 January 2003.
S1M-3611# General Agreement on Trade in Services (lodged on 20 November 2002) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Des McNulty*

S1M-3611# Helen Eadie: General Agreement on Trade in Services—That the Parliament welcomes the Department of Trade and Industry (DTI) consultation on the General Agreement on Trade in Services (GATS); notes that GATS covers many areas that are within the Parliament’s legislative competence, and believes that all interested parties across Scotland should submit their views to the DTI before the final date for submissions on 3 January 2003. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Des McNulty
S1M-3611# General Agreement on Trade in Services (lodged on 20 November 2002) Robin Harper*
S1M-3611# General Agreement on Trade in Services (lodged on 20 November 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-3611# General Agreement on Trade in Services (lodged on 20 November 2002) Karen Gillon*, Robert Brown*
S1M-3611# General Agreement on Trade in Services (lodged on 20 November 2002) Donald Gorrie*, Ms Margo MacDonald*, Nora Radcliffe*, Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-3611# General Agreement on Trade in Services (lodged on 20 November 2002) Pauline McNeill*, Maureen Macmillan*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S1M-3611# General Agreement on Trade in Services (lodged on 20 November 2002) Gordon Jackson*
S1M-3611# General Agreement on Trade in Services (lodged on 20 November 2002) Sarah Boyack*
S1M-3611# General Agreement on Trade in Services (lodged on 20 November 2002) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S1M-3611# General Agreement on Trade in Services (lodged on 20 November 2002) Alex Neil*

S1M-3611# General Agreement on Trade in Services (lodged on 20 November 2002) John Farquhar Munro*
S1M-3611# General Agreement on Trade in Services (lodged on 20 November 2002) Mr Duncan McNeil*

S1M-3611# Helen Eadie: General Agreement on Trade in Services—That the Parliament welcomes the Department of Trade and Industry (DTI) consultation on the General Agreement on Trade in Services (GATS); notes that GATS covers many areas that are within the Parliament’s legislative competence, and believes that all interested parties across Scotland should submit their views to the DTI before the final date for submissions on 3 January 2003. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Robin Harper, Mr Jamie Stone, Karen Gillon, Robert Brown, Donald Gorrie, Margo MacDonald, Nora Radcliffe, Tommy Sheridan, Dennis Canavan, Susan Deacon, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Tricia Marwick, Johann Lamont, Shona Robison, Nicola Sturgeon, Ms Sandra White, Pauline McNeill, Maureen Macmillan, Marilyn Livingstone, Gordon Jackson, Sarah Boyack, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Alex Neil, Dr Richard Simpson, Bruce Crawford, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Rhoda Grant, Mr Kenny MacAskill, John Farquhar Munro, Mr Duncan McNeil
